name: Tuner (simple)
description: This algorithm provides four simultaneous tuners using a simple pitch detection method which will only work reliably for simple tones. These are typically found in analogue VCOs within a Eurorack environment, where tuning is often required. Microtuning via Scala or MTS is supported, and the algorithm consumes little CPU due to its simplicity.
short_description: A basic tuner for simple tones
use_cases: Tuning analogue VCOs in Eurorack environments
Detecting pitch of monophonic or polyphonic simple tones
Microtuning with Scala or MTS tuning systems
gui_description: The display shows the detected pitch of active channels as a MIDI note number and cents, alongside an Hz value. A bar grows to the left (flat) or right (sharp) based on how the note deviates from its true pitch.

output_ports.name: Tuner_Output
output_ports.description: The detected pitch of the active channels (MIDI note number and cents, Hz value, and deviation bar)
